main event: Witnesses observed a strange object hovering in the sky, moving slowly and then rapidly taking off on November 12, 1965.
interesting points: The Air Force command post personnel reported seeing the object hover for a long time before it took off to the south., This was the second sighting of a bright object in the area within two weeks., The sighting lasted a total of 30 minutes and was confirmed by at least two sources., The weather was clear during the sighting., There are links drawn between UFO sightings and power failures in the northeastern United States around the same time.
sighted object: a strange object in the sky
location: Deep Hollow Marina, N.Y., NY, USA
